v0.1.0, 2012-12-06 -- Initial release.
v0.1.1, 2012-12-06 -- Bugfix in constructor.
v0.1.2, 2012-12-06 -- Adding background worker to prevent blocking while data is being fetched.
v0.1.3, 2013-05-14 -- Upgrading to requests v1.2.0.
v0.1.4  2013-05-15 -- Fixing broken pip install.
v0.2.0  2013-05-15 -- Adding support for file based configuration. Adding unit tests.
v0.3.0  2013-05-19 -- Adding initial support for the Rules API and tests.
